Bài đăng hiển thị theo : Lưu trữ cho: Tất cả bài đăng Không tìm thấy trang DNS Prefetch Social Meta Tags / Replace with your info All head content Include Library /* */ body#layout #top-bar .container,body#layout .header-header .container{display:-webkit-box;display:-webkit-flex;display:-moz-box;display:-ms-flexbox;display:flex} body#layout{position:relative;padding:95px 5px 0!important;margin:0} body#layout .section{margin:0 5px 10px;padding:16px 16px 18px} body#layout #content-wrapper,body#layout #content-wrapper>.container{margin:0} body#layout .section h4{font-size:14px;margin:0} body#layout #top-bar{height:auto} body#layout div.top-bar-nav,body#layout div.top-bar-social{width:100%} body#layout #header-wrap{height:auto} body#layout .header-header{float:left;width:66.66%;height:auto;padding:0} body#layout div.header-ads,body#layout div.header-logo{float:left;width:50%;height:auto;max-width:none;max-height:none} body#layout .mobile-header{display:block;float:right;width:33.33%;height:auto} body#layout .mobile-menu{display:none} body#layout .header-menu{float:left;width:100%;height:auto} body#layout #main-menu{height:auto} body#layout #main-wrapper{float:left;width:66.66%;padding:0} body#layout #sidebar-wrapper{float:right;width:33.33%;padding:0} body#layout #main-menu .widget{display:block} body#layout #footer-wrapper .footer .widget-content{float:none;width:auto} body#layout .widget-content{float:none;overflow:visible;width:auto} body#layout .footer-widgets-wrap{display:-webkit-box;display:-webkit-flex;display:-moz-box;display:-ms-flexbox;display:flex} body#layout .footer-widgets-wrap div.footer{width:100%} // var monthFormat = ["January", "February", "March", "April", "May", "June", "July", "August", "September", "October", "November", "December"], noThumbnail = "https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-O3EpVMWcoKw/WxY6-6I4--I/AAAAAAAAB2s/KzC0FqUQtkMdw7VzT6oOR_8vbZO6EJc-ACK4BGAYYCw/w680/nth.png", postPerPage = 15, numComments = 7, avatarSize = 36, characters = 36;
